thread.title: Tara Walker

author: Tara Walker
title: Tara Walker
text: This is my first experience of Tyres on the Drive and I couldn't be more impressed. So easy to book, courtesy call half an hour before arrival, Aaron was polite, helpful, informative and friendly and I love the fact I didn't need to leave the house and wait in a garage for an hour. Great value and so easy that I will be recommending Tyres on the Drive to everyone! Thank you.
